bonus: Loot and experience from marine creatures
details: Experience gains and the chances of dropping loot are increased by 75% against all monsters considered to be marine creatures (beach monsters, Crabs, Coralators, Craborals, Moon Turtles, Gullipops, Giant Kralove, the Abysses of Sufokia monsters, Submerged Ones, and Crocuzko Crocodyls).
The quantity of small river fishSea (Gudgeon, Trout, Kittenfish, Ediem Carp) and small sea fish (Grawn, Crab Surimi, Breaded Fish, Shiny Sardine) harvested by fishermen is increased by 125%.
Experience gained in the Mount Tombs area is increased by 100%.
Artificers save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
Experience gained in the Crackler Dungeon is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Howling Heights area are increased by 100%.
The quantity of Barley harvested by farmers is increased by 125%.
Experience gained by fighting Moon Beach Monsters is increased by 75%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Inner Labyrinth of the Minotoror dungeon.
All varieties of Crimson Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Cania Lake area.
The chances of obtaining loot from creatures in the Mist Army family are increased by 75%.
The quantity of Ebony Wood and Kaliptus Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 150%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against Zoth Village monsters.
For each item crafted, handymen have a 25% chance of creating a second one.
Craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Astrub area, as well as in the fields and in Astrub Forest.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Jelly Peninsula area are increased by 100%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Bearbarians.
The quantity of Gold harvested by miners is increased by 150%.
Experience gained in the Feudala area is increased by 100%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Inner Labyrinth of the Minotoror dungeon are increased by 125%.
Resources will reappear 150% more quickly than usual in the Kawaii River and Madrestam Harbour areas.
Experience gained by fighting Peat Bog monsters is increased by 75%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Crackler Mountain area.
The quantity of Stale Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
Kamas gained are increased by 100% for all quests.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Rocky Roads area.
Miners save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
The chances of obtaining loot from creatures in the Piwi family are increased by 75%.
The quantity of plants harvested by alchemists of all levels is increased by 100%.
